external_references.description: Dantzig, M. v., Schamper, E. (2019, December 19). Operation Wocao: Shining a light on one of China’s hidden hacking groups. Retrieved October 8, 2020.

description: For [Operation Wocao](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0014), the threat actors purchased servers with Bitcoin to use during the operation.(Citation: FoxIT Wocao December 2019)
